meeting_info.organization: City Council Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the February 12, 2024, Workforce, Education and Equity Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Update on Racial Equity Plan Strategies & Initiatives - Big Audacious Goals (BAGS) and Department Progress Measures as of February 2024
agenda_items.description: An update on the strategies and initiatives related to racial equity.
agenda_items.presenter: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director; Dr. Lisa Rainey, Equity Officer; Office of Equity and Inclusion

agenda_items.title: Discussion of Mayor's Memo Regarding Community Input of the Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee’s Policy Areas
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the Mayor's memo regarding community input.

agenda_items.title: January 2024 Update on Work Performance Measures for Workforce Dallas
agenda_items.description: An update on work performance measures.
agenda_items.presenter: Lynn McBee, Workforce Dallas; Joyce Williams, Director of Small Business Center

agenda_items.title: Update on Digital Equity Affordable Connectivity Program as of February 2024
agenda_items.description: An update on the Digital Equity Affordable Connectivity Program.
agenda_items.presenter: Genesis Gavino, Chief of Staff, City Manager’s Office
